answers.answer: BumpI'd like to know also
Id like to know too...I'm getting induced Friday if I don't go into labor..:/
Yeah my dr said he wants to induce me in 17 days bcus supposedly my baby is too big
I got induced because I was about 38 weeks and had preeclampsia but  they waited 15 hours into labor and I had a c section because I wouldn't dialte more then 8cm
Dammn...was there a reason u stopped dilating???
I had a friend who was induced a few hours after she went into labor an had her little girl natural it just all depends on your body but good luck ladies hope everything goes great with yall ! (:
Your Doctor should give you your bishop score. Its a score of how ripe your cervix is and well give you a good idea of your chances. I had a cesarean bc I stopped dilating at 8 cm supposedly
Omg really? Do u know why u stopped
Nope failure to progress that's all they told me. In truth I think the epidural didn't help and I just flat out think they have up on my I was, only in labor for 10 hours.
I had a 2 day induction and after 26 hours of labor ny son was born naturally and healthy! Although mt labor was long it went by veey smoothly with no complications :( good luck!
Cecilia Morgan i think they did give up on trying bcus 10 hours of labor is not much...im hoping for the best
I had to with both of mine & they were both very successful ☺️

I was induced with ny first, they waited 12 hours before doing a c section, I didnt stop dilating, my sons head got stuck at 7 cm, thats when they found out i have a small tilted pelvic bone. Im on my second and having another c section because of this. Lol, and i think my little girl will be here sooner than 23 days.

I was induced and had my baby in 7 hours. My sister was induced with two of her kids had them in 5 hrs. Her last one she was induced and had a c section because baby was breech and they didn't know. My mom was induced with all 3 of her kids and none lasting more than 9 hours. I've had three friends be induced and none lasted longer than 13 hours. So..so far I've known one c section because of induction and that was because baby's position.

Yea I think they did jen :-( they basically told me in a round about way they said his heart rate kept going down a little everytime he steered his way down but that is kinda normal anyway and they said he kept going back up bc he was to big maybe true idk. He was 8.6lbs and I am only 4'10 but my hips are as wide as a normal person lol but they said I have a narrow pelvis ugh idk. All ik is my ob this time will not induce me bc I am vbac she does vbacs all the time totally second nature to her I get 41 weeks to go into labor after that cesarean bc baby will be to big for my by then im hopingbi go into labor all goes well. I want a natural birth sooo bad :-(

Oh wow thanks ladies and cecilia good luck hope u get to deliver your baby vaginally, my dr says bcus my baby is 5 and a half pounds she'll be big which i kno hes full of it and has been wanting to give me a c section its my first baby and i want her to come on her own plus hes trying to induce me at 39 wks so im scared my cervix might not be ready or for some reason he'll find a reason to do c section...its bs
Im 36 wks 4 days

Ask for your bishop score before you agree to an induction! That can help rule out the possibility of "failure to progress". Your bishop score indicates whether or not your induction is likely to work.Check out this link for more info: http://wellroundedmama.blogspot.com/2012/02/induction-math-importance-of-bishop.html?m=1
Sorry for replying so late.  But they also said my baby was down but was the wrong way or something like that

@kelllyxoxoWhat position were you laboring in? If your baby was posterior (face up), he/she would be a bit more likely to get stuck, especially if you were laying down. I wouldn't necessarily rule out a vaginal birth if you want one, but if you're more comfortable with a Cesarean, go for it!

Got induced at 35 weeks wit my first son dey actually had tu induce me 3 times because I wouldn't dialated but the third time worked started dialating every 15 mins after 21 hours in labor I felt no pain until it was time tu push an I had him natural I had him in 2 pushes an gave birth 2 a 4pound 8oz bby dat went tu full term nursery an spent no extra nights in the hospital
Thanks ladies and n c section is my last option

question: Was it successful? Or did you end up getting a c section because of complications?  I will be getting induced in about 17 days so I wanna know what my chances are...thank you ladies!
title: FOR MOMMAS THAT GOT INDUCED
